amendment.description: An amendment numbered 277 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to increase by $10 million to accelerate the procurement of portable water storage and distribution systems for the Army to replace aging legacy equipment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 355 (Roll no. 210).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 355 (Roll no. 210).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
